You know, maybe not. I didn't get the whole gist of their issue, they might not have the same problem we do. I can see you already found the chat I copied that from, but I'll post the link for anyone else having problems> http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1565382642_1MdYzyr3Q15o6GxLcfzEeFvNfoNPQajUWw

The whole thing is pretty fucky. If we could get an updated version from someone else (through some kind of filesharing maybe) it might just work. Hopefully the site owner can work this out before then, but man is this annoying.

> [npc128556](#comment_4_1JUcT8ywBK4wSMpWXDbbuyQMaQqfD269ws): it's like there are 7 threads up in the catalog and I can't post

Actually, if I remember correctly, I was having the same issue the first time I downloaded 08chan. I think I fixed it by just leaving it running. I don't know if it won't now because of the update but I guess it's worth a try. I'll leave mine on all night and update you tomorrow.
https://anonfile.com/Kc07Bf2bnf/update_08chan_s_Millchan_version_201908081621_zip Does something. I think I can post now, even though I can't see posts from before the update. It's an improvement.
